hero.tagline: Bergabung dengan Program Mitra Silence AI
hero.title: Ubah undangan menjadi pendapatan.

snapshot.label: Tinjauan langsung
snapshot.caption: Kinerja diperbarui setiap 60 detik dan pembayaran yang dikonfirmasi tersinkron secara instan.

create.title: Buat tautan Anda
create.description: Buat tautan rujukan atau kode promo unik di dasbor Silence AI Anda.

share.title: Bagikan
share.description: Undang tim melalui email, LinkedIn, dan komunitas. Pantau performa secara real time.

earn.title: Dapatkan
earn.description: Terima komisi segera setelah pelanggan rujukan Anda mengaktifkan perlindungan Silence AI.

commission.heading: Reward saldo

reward.title: Bonus 10% pada setiap top-up saldo
reward.description: Saat tim undangan mengisi ulang dompet Silence AI, 10% dari nilai bersih langsung dikreditkan kepada Anda.

settlement.title: Pencatatan buku besar real time
settlement.description: Reward masuk ke saldo mitra Anda dalam satu menit setelah transaksi selesai—tanpa antrean persetujuan manual.

withdrawal.title: Withdrawals processed in 2 business days
withdrawal.description: Permintaan penarikan ditinjau otomatis dan tiba di rekening bank Anda dalam dua hari kerja.

sample.label: Contoh top-up
sample.caption: Pendapatan mitra bertambah setiap kali isi saldo—tanpa reset level ataupun pemetaan produk.

commission.note: Komisi dihitung dari jumlah bersih setelah biaya pemrosesan pembayaran.

payments.question: Bagaimana saya menerima pembayaran?
payments.answer: Tambahkan nomor kartu VISA atau Mastercard Anda di profil. Pembayaran dapat ditarik langsung ke kartu tersebut.

discounts.question: Apakah pelanggan rujukan mendapat diskon?
discounts.answer: Tidak. Pelanggan rujukan tidak mendapat diskon; hanya mitra yang menerima komisi dari rujukan yang berhasil.

statistics.question: Kapan saya melihat statistik rujukan?
statistics.answer: Begitu pengguna mendaftar dengan kode promo atau tautan rujukan Anda, alamat email dan reward terkait muncul di dasbor Anda.

termsAff.label: Affiliate Program
termsAff.title: Affiliate Terms of Service
termsAff.notice: This policy is available only in English
termsAff.intro: These terms describe how rewards are issued and paid to partners participating in the Silence AI affiliate program.

overview.title: 1. Program Overview
overview.body1: 1.1 Agreement Scope: These Affiliate Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your participation in the Silence AI affiliate program operated by Silence AI LLC ("Silence AI," "we," "us," or "our"). These Terms apply to you, the individual or entity enrolling as an affiliate partner ("you" or "your"), and, where applicable, your employer, principal, or organization if you act on their behalf.
overview.body2: 1.2 Program Summary: Under this program, qualified partners earn commission-based rewards when referred customers purchase or top up the AI-SOC 1 product. Participation in the affiliate program also requires compliance with the general Silence AI Terms of Service.

eligibility.title: 2. Partner Eligibility
eligibility.item1: You must maintain an active Silence AI affiliate account with accurate business and payment details.
eligibility.item2: Referrals must complete registration through your issued link or promo code.
eligibility.item3: Accounts found to be fraudulent, self-referred, or in breach of applicable law are not eligible for rewards.

commission.title: 3. Commission Structure
commission.body1: You earn a 10% reward on every balance top-up completed by an account registered through your invitation.
commission.body2: Commission is calculated from the net top-up amount after payment processing fees are deducted.

rewardPosting.title: 4. Reward Posting
rewardPosting.body1: Rewards post to your partner balance within one minute after the transaction successfully clears. There is no manual approval queue.
rewardPosting.body2: Notifications appear in your affiliate dashboard alongside the customer identifier and top-up amount.

withdrawals.title: 5. Withdrawals
withdrawals.body1: Withdrawal requests are processed within two business days and paid out using the settlement method on file.
withdrawals.body2: Minimum withdrawal thresholds and supported payout networks are published inside the affiliate dashboard.

productScope.title: 6. Product Scope
productScope.body1: Rewards are only provided for the AI-SOC 1 product. Other Silence AI services are excluded from the affiliate program unless explicitly stated otherwise in writing.
productScope.body2: If additional products become eligible, Silence AI will publish an updated list inside these terms.

compliance.title: 7. Partner Conduct & Compliance
compliance.item1: Partners must represent Silence AI accurately and avoid misleading claims about features or pricing.
compliance.item2: Marketing communications must comply with applicable anti-spam, privacy, and advertising regulations.
compliance.item3: Silence AI may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these obligations or harm the brand.

changes.title: 8. Changes & Contact
changes.body1: Silence AI may update these affiliate terms to reflect changes in the program or applicable law. Updated versions take effect upon publication on this page.
changes.body2: Questions about the affiliate program can be sent to info@silenceai.net.

hero.headline: AI-SOC 1: keamanan siber kini tidak mahal dan tidak rumit
hero.subheading: Sistem keamanan siber berbasis AI serba lengkap yang menggabungkan:

web.title: Perlindungan serangan web
web.content: Sistem melindungi dari SEMUA jenis serangan web seperti DDoS dan SQLi (kecuali kerentanan logika bisnis)

email.title: Perlindungan serangan email
email.content: Sistem melindungi dari SEMUA jenis serangan email, termasuk phishing, lampiran berbahaya, dan tautan berisiko

vulnerability.title: Pencari kerentanan
vulnerability.content: Sistem menemukan kelemahan di kode aplikasi dan melalui interaksi dinamis dengan situs/API Anda, termasuk dukungan mesin intelijen

cookie.title: Pemberitahuan cookie teknis
cookie.description: Situs ini hanya menggunakan cookie teknis pihak pertama yang kami setel untuk mengingat preferensi bahasa Anda dan agar pemberitahuan ini tidak muncul lagi pada kunjungan berikutnya. Tidak ada cookie pelacakan maupun pihak ketiga yang digunakan.

pricing.title: Harga

cmcGlobal.title: CMC dengan pemantauan trafik global
cmcGlobal.content: Console Manajemen Terpusat (CMC) terintegrasi dengan mulus ke sistem keamanan lain dan menggunakan domain serta antarmuka yang sama dengan Global Shield dan Security Tester. Dari sini Anda bisa memblokir negara, menutup port, dan menjalankan operasi lain

countryBlacklisting.title: Blokir berdasarkan negara
countryBlacklisting.content: Blokir seluruh trafik yang berasal dari negara tertentu

portManagement.title: Manajemen port
portManagement.content: Tutup port yang tidak digunakan untuk mengurangi permukaan serangan. Misalnya, nonaktifkan port 22 jika akses SSH tidak diperlukan

cmcEmail.title: CMC dengan visualisasi alur email canggih
cmcEmail.content: CMC terintegrasi dengan sistem keamanan lainnya dan memungkinkan Anda memantau alur email serta meninjau pesan dari seluruh pengguna korporat yang ditambahkan

dynamicVulnerability.title: Pencari kerentanan dinamis
dynamicVulnerability.content: Mendeteksi kelemahan dengan berinteraksi langsung dengan situs Anda, termasuk dukungan dari sistem intelijen

codeAnalyzer.title: Penganalisis kode
codeAnalyzer.content: Mengidentifikasi masalah keamanan langsung di basis kode melalui plugin VS Code agar bisa diperbaiki sebelum rilis

intelligenceReport.title: Laporan intelijen
intelligenceReport.content: Memberikan wawasan detail tentang target Anda, termasuk port terbuka, layanan yang berjalan, subdomain, dan informasi sensitif lainnya

fullVulnerability.title: Pemeriksaan kerentanan MENYELURUH
fullVulnerability.content: Pemeriksaan menyeluruh mencakup pemindaian dinamis dan pemindaian kode

features.webProtection: Melindungi dari semua jenis serangan web kecuali eksploitasi logika bisnis

emailProtector.title: Keamanan email
emailProtector.description:
Hingga 10 email per hari
Email tambahan: $0,035 per email

features.cmcEmail: CMC dengan visualisasi alur email paling canggih
features.visibility: Visibilitas penuh terhadap email masuk & keluar dengan klasifikasi ancaman otomatis

securityTester.title: Pencari kerentanan
securityTester.description:
Hingga 50 pemeriksaan MENYELURUH per bulan
Pemeriksaan tambahan: $0,5 per pemeriksaan

pricing.subtitle: Rencana mobile-first yang dibangun untuk berkembang dengan produk Anda...

calculator.title: Project Cost Calculator
calculator.subtitle: Slide to see your yearly maintenance

solution.sectionSubtitle: Siap dalam 4 menit dan dapat digunakan oleh profesional TI mana pun—tanpa perlu keahlian khusus keamanan siber. Kami menghadirkan visualisasi tingkat lanjut dan harga yang terjangkau.

globalShield.title: Global Shield - pemantauan trafik setara CIA
globalShield.description: Globe 3D interaktif kami menampilkan trafik web Anda secara dramatis: permintaan per detik, pengguna aktif, dan volume dalam byte.

bullets.one: Penyiapan mudah: cukup tentukan IP dan domain Anda.
bullets.two: Terima IP agen untuk ditambahkan ke DNS.
bullets.three: Tutup port untuk menghilangkan permukaan serangan.

emailProtector.title: Email Protector - perlindungan email berbasis AI pertama di dunia
emailProtector.description: Sistem perlindungan email komersial pertama yang memanfaatkan AI. Tampilan vektor mempermudah pelacakan alur email dan identifikasi ancaman.

bullets.one: Mendeteksi spoofing, spam, phishing, dan malware.
bullets.two: Admin dapat menambahkan akun email untuk dilindungi.
bullets.three: Visualisasi alur email komersial paling canggih.

securityTester.title: Security Tester - pengujian kerentanan generasi berikutnya
securityTester.description: Sistem menyediakan One-Time-Token (OTT) untuk pengujian keamanan menyeluruh. Hubungkan melalui browser atau ekstensi VS Code.

bullets.one: Tentukan cakupan dan target keamanan di CMC.
bullets.three: Wawasan risiko yang digerakkan oleh intelijen.

cmc.title: Console Manajemen Terpusat (CMC)
cmc.description: Ketiga komponen dikelola melalui console terpadu yang menyediakan visualisasi terpusat, konfigurasi serta pemantauan yang mudah, dan laporan keamanan yang lengkap.

items.title: 20 juta serangan DDoS
items.description: 20,5 juta serangan DDoS terjadi hanya pada kuartal pertama 2025

floatingText.headline: Ketahui cara berpikir para peretas
floatingText.description: Ikuti riset harian kami tentang metode serangan nyata dan ancaman siber

modal.title: Sedang dalam pengembangan
modal.body: The system is expected to be launched on October 10

webSecurity.title: Sistem keamanan web: situs/API tersambung dalam 2 menit
webSecurity.description: Perlindungan terhadap serangan web seperti DDoS dan SQLi. Menutup port 22 saat tidak digunakan adalah praktik terbaik.

ciaMonitoring.title: Pemantauan trafik setara CIA
ciaMonitoring.description: Globe 3D interaktif menampilkan trafik berdasarkan permintaan, pengguna, dan volume serta memungkinkan melihat riwayat perubahan.

aiEmailProtection.title: Perlindungan email berbasis AI: jaringan aktif dalam 2 menit
aiEmailProtection.description: CMC memberi admin visibilitas penuh terhadap semua email yang dikirim/diterima dan secara otomatis mengklasifikasikan ancaman seperti spoofing, spam, phishing, tautan berbahaya, dan malware.

emailVisualization.title: Visualisasi email yang dikirim dan diterima
emailVisualization.description: CMC dengan visualisasi alur email komersial paling canggih

secureWebmail.title: Klien webmail aman
secureWebmail.description: Untuk akun yang ditambahkan admin tersedia klien web sangat aman yang mendeteksi spoofing, spam, phishing, dan malware.

footer.addressValue: Media City Free Zone, Al Messaned, Sharjah, UAE
footer.copyright: © {year} Silence AI. Seluruh hak cipta dilindungi.

notFound.title: Halaman tidak ditemukan
notFound.description: Kami mencari di mana-mana tetapi tidak dapat menemukan halaman ini.

heroSection.title: Pengembangan AI & Perangkat Lunak Kustom
heroSection.description: Kami membangun agen AI siap produksi dan perangkat lunak kustom.

hero.title: Build systems with secure and private code
hero.description: Private development environment for enterprises, where code never leaves your corporate network. Meanwhile offering the latest AI-powered technology

components.title: Everything stays inside
components.subtitle: Three components, one sealed loop
components.description: Code, prompts, and builds never leave your network. SLNC-env keeps AI help, reviews, and delivery private for cloud providers, government teams, and industrial plants.

incident.title: Critical incident — leaked code
incident.heading: DeepSeek breach put source and prompts on the open internet
incident.description: Keep inference and scanning on-prem. No external model egress. Audit trails by default.

quality.title: Automatic code quality
quality.description: Structure, style, and best-practice checks tuned for safety-critical code

vulnerability.title: Vulnerability sweeps
vulnerability.description: SQLi, XSS, auth bypass, and insecure dependencies surfaced instantly

secrets.title: Secrets guard
secrets.description: Keys, tokens, and credentials blocked at commit time

config.title: Config hardening
config.description: Docker/K8s, IAM, and network policies scanned for privilege creep

beyondCodeQL.title: Finds what static queries miss
beyondCodeQL.subtitle: Beyond CodeQL
beyondCodeQL.description: Finds misconfigs and vulnerable packages faster than CodeQL and offers fixes, not just alerts.

points.packages: Knows package graphs and flags risky dependencies in seconds.
points.config: Spots config drift and privilege creep—beyond static rules.
points.patches: Each finding comes with a suggested patch and owner.

visualizer.title: Code analyzer in action
visualizer.subtitle: Visualizer
visualizer.description: Crisp snapshots from recent scans, rendered beautifully inside the on-prem console.

scanOverview.title: Scan overview
scanOverview.description: See issues grouped by severity before code leaves your network.

misconfigurations.title: Detection of misconfigurations
misconfigurations.description: Our AI-powered code analyzer even finds misconfigurations within the code.

inlineDiffs.title: Inline diffs
inlineDiffs.description: Review suggested patches inline with security context.

contactForm.title: Contact Us
contactForm.success: Thanks! Your message has been sent. We will contact you shortly.
contactForm.errorRequired: Please fill in your name, email and a short message.
contactForm.errorSend: Unable to send message. Please try again later.

questions.question: What is your company's core value proposition beyond competitive pricing?
questions.answer: Security is our primary differentiator. We position ourselves as a company that builds highly secure systems with enterprise-grade security practices embedded throughout the development lifecycle.

questions.question: How long has your company been in business, and what is your track record?
questions.answer: We have successfully delivered major projects including: NAK (Nur Astana Kurylys) - AI-powered team management platform, and Chic Flowers - Complete digital platform for a major flower retail company.

questions.question: What differentiates your technical capabilities and service quality from EPAM and other competitors?
questions.answer: Our key differentiator is our security-first development approach. We integrate security practices from project inception through deployment and maintenance.

questions.question: How do you maintain quality while offering competitive pricing?
questions.answer: We offer services at 15% below market rates while maintaining exceptional quality through optimized operations, strategic talent sourcing, and efficient project management methodologies.

questions.question: What specific software development services do you provide?
questions.answer: End-to-end software development: custom applications, AI-powered solutions, cybersecurity product development (Silence AI-SOC), system integration, cloud migration, and DevOps. We also offer dedicated product development and staff augmentation.

questions.question: Which industries and domains do you specialize in?
questions.answer: Construction, retail, fintech, cybersecurity, and digital platforms — including AI-driven team management, e-commerce, and enterprise security solutions.

questions.question: What technology stacks and platforms does your team have expertise in?
questions.answer: GO, Swift, Flutter, cloud platforms (AWS/Azure/GCP), Docker/Kubernetes, FastAPI, JavaScript, and AI/ML frameworks. We build proprietary security tools like Silence AI-SOC.

questions.question: Do you offer end-to-end product development or specific services only?
questions.answer: We offer both: MVPs, full-cycle product delivery, staff augmentation, and cybersecurity integration.

questions.question: Can you provide both staff augmentation and dedicated team models?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide flexible engagement models: staff augmentation, dedicated teams, and project-based outsourcing.

questions.question: Do you offer consulting, architecture, and advisory services beyond development?
questions.answer: Yes: cybersecurity consulting, system architecture design, technology advisory, and security compliance assessments using Silence AI-SOC.

systems.title: Systems
systems.subtitle: Choose the subscription product that fits: AI-SOC for detection and SLNC-env for sealed development.

aiSoc.title: AI-SOC
aiSoc.desc: Managed detection & response system powered and operated by AI. Used to prevent web and email attacks

slncEnv.title: SLNC-env
slncEnv.desc: Sealed development cloud that keeps code, prompts, and builds on-prem.

sithub.title: Sithub
sithub.desc: Self-hosted GitHub alternative with built-in security scanning. All repositories and code analysis stay within your network.

services.subtitle: AI agents, integrations, and full-cycle software delivery with security baked in from day one.

cards.agents: Production-grade AI agents with guardrails, RAG, and secure connectors.
cards.integrations: Vendor-neutral integrations with your stack, IAM, and data governance.
cards.delivery: Full-cycle delivery with reliability SLOs, observability, and security reviews.
